direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check the state of the collection but for different conditions (full vs. empty).
Both methods interact with the collection's size constraints, though for different purposes.
Both methods involve collection operations but with different synchronization contexts.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require collection initialization before performing checks.
Adding elements to the collection affects the state checked by isFull.
Both methods verify the state of the collection and handle similar exceptions.
